name: CrewMunity
description: CrewMunity is a dynamic and user-friendly mobile application designed to bring people together through events and social activities

name: RemindMe
description: Created a Chrome extension using the Plasmo framework (React) to connect with Firebase and sync information with a mobile app.

name: Inventory App
description: Create a customized and efficient inventory app for internal business usage in Microsoft PowerApps

name: River segmentation
description: Trained a machine learning model for semantic segmentation of river regions, achieving a Dice score of 0.91. Dockerized and added to Kubernetes the full data pipeline including Apache Kafka, MinIO, TimescaleDB, and Grafana.
